headline: How FIS’s BMW Bank Digital Transformation Reinforces Its Strength in Core-Plus Banking Solutions
summary: Fidelity National Information Services, Inc. (NYSE:FIS) is one of the best FinTech stocks to buy in 2026. As of December 16, Wall Street’s consensus view on FIS remains a Moderate Buy, with analysts tracked by MarketBeat assigning an average 12-month price target of about $85.4, implying roughly 28% upside from current trading levels.
